lead_paragraph: The inquiry represents one of his most concrete actions since a sexual abuse scandal hit the European church.
snippet: The inquiry represents one of his most concrete actions since a sexual abuse scandal hit the European church.

headline.main: Pope Names Team to Investigate Abuse in Ireland
headline.print_headline: Vatican Sets Inquiry Of Dioceses In Ireland

byline.contributor: Eamon Quinn contributed reporting from Dublin, and Paul Vitello from New York.
